Exaggerate: The claim may be exaggerating the significance of the incident by suggesting that a man was set up as a BJP supporter to garland Kanhaiya Kumar.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or support to prove that the incident was a set-up.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the sequence of events depicted in the photo-montage is accurate and represents a deliberate set-up.
Exist alternative explanation: The expert's verdict provides an alternative explanation that the sequence of events in the photo-montage was actually in reverse order, contradicting the claim.
Contradict fact: The expert's verdict contradicts the claim by stating that the allegation of the incident being a set-up is false.
Understate: There is no apparent understatement bias in the claim.
